description: Child table that defines task templates within a Setup Template. Each row generates a real Clarinet Setup Task with expected schedule and priority when applied to a Clarinet Initial Setup.

fields.description: Ordering number used when generating tasks (e.g., 10, 20, 30).
fields.label: Sequence

fields.description: Template-level predecessors (referencing other template rows by sequence).
fields.label: Depends On

fields.description: Task title that will be copied to the generated Clarinet Setup Task.
fields.label: Subject

fields.description: Optional notes that will be copied to the generated Clarinet Setup Task.
fields.label: Description

fields.description: Priority to apply to the generated task.
fields.label: Priority

fields.description: Days after the Setup Date that the generated task should start (0 = same day).
fields.label: Expected Start Offset (days)

fields.description: Planned duration in days for the generated task (at least 1).
fields.label: Expected Duration (mins)

name: Clarinet Template Task
